website_summaries.verdict: Laundry pedestal for raising height of washer or dryer and providing more storage, available in two colors.
pros: Product raises washer or dryer to ideal height for less bending and stooping while laundering
Also provides drawer for organization and storage of laundry room essentials
Purchase price includes delivery and installation
cons: Must be careful to match dimensions of pedestal with washer or dryer, particularly non-Kenmore brands

customer_reviews.title: Such a great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These drawers fit all of our laundry supplies and have room for more storage. They make it so much easier to reach the washer and dryer without bending over. I wish we had gotten these sooner. Such a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: West Point Alum

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these pedestals!
customer_reviews.text: I️ use these with a LG Tromm washer and dryer. The measurements were correct. The washer and dryer are not attached with the brackets that were included because the attachment holes were not there on the LG model, but they still sit fine on the pedestals. I️ used the delivery and set up service and everything went smoothly!
customer_reviews.author: rn4kids

customer_reviews.title: Highway robbery at its finest
customer_reviews.text: It elevates the washer dryer to a nice level. I'll never agree to the price they charge. Its probably made for 50 bucks but it costs you almost 200.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Too big for a compact Kenmore dryer
customer_reviews.text: It certainly is a good product, but despite what Sears said and ordered, it is oversized for a Kenmore compact dryer. Since there do not seem to be any such pedestals on the market after all, we kept it and did a work_around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We bought this to go under a small refrigerator in ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to go under a small refrigerator in our garage. The wider size of this unit worked well for us. Most are only 27" which wouldn't work under a 30" fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Karynn Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and love that I don't have to bend over anymore. I do wish it was already included with washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Did not include hookup
customer_reviews.text: The info states includes hookup. No hookup provided for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Polaris Bags

customer_reviews.title: Great service!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these expecting to mount and assemble the washer, but they delivered and installed them. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: DLF

customer_reviews.title: Quality products.
customer_reviews.text: Great Kenmore products makes it very easy to load and unload clothes from washer/dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Designed by idiot made also by LG
customer_reviews.text: No brain person designed this. The drawer cannot be taken out without unscrewing side rails so not easy to clean or retrieve something under the washer. I use powder but liquid laundry stuff won't fit in this drawer. Holes in bottom of drawer so when washing machined leaks from filter it falls into drawer, leaks out the holes to under the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not legal for dryers in California
customer_reviews.text: In California, the law requires that gas dryers in garages be on a pedestal at least 18 inches high. This pedestal is less than that. Thus, the description should warn that it is not legal to use for dryers in California.
customer_reviews.author: F. R. Eggers

product_meta.title: Kenmore 51122 13.7" Laundry Pedestal with Storage Drawer in White, includes delivery and hookup
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThis Kenmore 13.7-inch laundry pedestal features a drawer for extra storage to keep all your laundry items organized in an easy-to-access spot. The optional 13.7 inch-high pedestal helps elevate your washer and dryer to the ideal height. Easier loading and unloading also means less bending and reaching, making doing the laundry less of a physical strain.
feature_bullets: CONVENIENT ACCESS: Pedestal elevates your washer or dryer for easier access to your laundry. Raises washer or dryer 13.7" off the ground. Perfect for front load washers and dryers
LAUNDRY ROOM STORAGE: Washer/dryer pedestal has built-in storage for organizing laundry essentials, like fabric softerner, detergent, and dryer sheets. Includes divider for organizing
STYLISH AESTHETIC: Sleek design fits any laundry room décor and adds a stylish look to your laundry space
DIMENSIONS: 29.75" L x 27" W x 13.7" H Measure the available space to ensure the item will fit
DELIVERY INCLUDED: Purchase includes room of choice delivery, unboxing, item hook-up (including required parts) and free optional haul-away of old appliance at checkout

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars12 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
